sentences.en: A new machine no bigger than a 10p piece could help save babies from cot death.
sentences.cn: 一种体积不超过10便士硬币大小的新机器能防止婴儿猝死。

sentences.en: At night he would lie sleepless on his cot, suffering an almost unbearable frustration.
sentences.cn: 晚上他躺在行军床上睡不着觉, 灰心丧气难熬难挨.

sentences.en: Babies who sleep with their parents receive much more tactile stimulation than babies who sleep in a cot.
sentences.cn: 婴儿和父母睡在一块儿比单独睡在婴儿床中能得到更多的触觉刺激。

sentences.en: But Minetta found himself still looking at the vacant cot.
sentences.cn: 米尼塔却还呆呆地望着空床兀自出神.

sentences.en: Doctors still aren't sure what causes cot deaths.
sentences.cn: 医生仍不确定婴儿猝死的原因。

sentences.en: He Finally got up and, throwing off his clothes, climbed into his iron cot.
sentences.cn: 最后他站起身来, 把衣服一脱, 爬到铁床上.

sentences.en: He must have climbed out of his cot.
sentences.cn: 他肯定是从婴儿床里爬出来的。

sentences.en: He twisted on his cot and felt pity for himself.
sentences.cn: 他在床上翻了个身,想想自己有多可怜哪.

sentences.en: Presently he decided to retire, and picked a cot, also removing his shoes.
sentences.cn: 不一会儿,他决定去睡觉, 就挑了一张床, 也把鞋子脱了.

sentences.en: Put a selection of baby toys in his cot to amuse him if he wakes early.
sentences.cn: 要在婴儿床里放一些玩具，以便他醒得早时可以自己玩。

sentences.en: The baby hurt itself when it fell out of its cot.
sentences.cn: 婴儿从小床掉下来,受了伤.

sentences.en: The baby is fast asleep in his cot.
sentences.cn: 婴儿在他的小床上熟睡着.

sentences.en: The girl lay on an army cot, all doped up with Valium.
sentences.cn: 那女孩躺在行军床上，因服用安定剂完全处于恍惚的状态。

sentences.en: The phenomenon of cot death has yet to be explained.
sentences.cn: 婴儿猝死的现象仍然不可解.

sentences.en: The walls were lined with white cot - baskets in which babies lay.
sentences.cn: 四周壁下,挨排的放着许多的小白匡床,里面卧着许多小朋友.

words.tran_cn: 小屋；村舍；（农舍式的）小别墅
